page.title: 12ADULT EDUCATION IN STOPSLEY
page.content: In Stopsley Community College there are all kinds of day classes from painting and sewing to gardening and languages. The adults use the school facilities when they are not needed by the school. The classes are mainly for the retired and elderly but the age of students runs from 16 year old students to the over 80's. One woman started a course and was unable to finish it because she had died. Some of the classes are for people to improve their skills for things in the home,or painting, or gardening. If you wanted to take certain subjects for examinations you would have to go to a separate specialist college. You can however study basic languages like Spanish, French and German.
